name: Winged Skeleton
pages: Winged Skeletons are the result of dark experiments by dark sorcerers. Though they have wings, they cannot fly very high like a living being. They are similar to Skeletons except they can use wooden swords or bows. Winged Skeletons can not wear armor as that would weigh them down too much.

$(l)Number$(): 1-2$(br)$(l)Size$(): Medium$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Common$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Flies$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 20hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 2hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): No$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Overworld, Underworld
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Equipped with wooden sword or bow.
